attributes.action: Not give Steven Gerrard or any footballers knighthoods/honours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it time and time again people are calling for footballers to be knighted or honoured? What have they ever done to deserve them? All most footballers do these days is make lots of money and have huge egos. Ordinary hard-working underappreciated people like doctors/nurses/firefighters deserve honours and it is only once in a blue moon they recieve them. It is about people got their priorities straight and gave credit to those who truly deserve it
